main event: A sighting of a slow, sharp dimmed object resembling a star occurred in Woodstock, Georgia during November 1957.
interesting points: The object dimmed and disappeared after about 1 minute,The object remained mostly still for about 9 minutes before its disappearance,The observation lasted a total of 10 minutes,The source of the observation was noted as a civilian and could not be conclusively identified,There were comments suggesting the sighting may have been astronomical in nature.
sighted object: a sharp dimmed object resembling a star
